name: Trapped Within
description: Can you escape the maze or be Trapped Within along side the other abductee's in eternal slumber?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: AMD A6-6310 or higher Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Integrated video (AMD RADEON R4 or later), 1GB VRAM. (Shader Model 3) DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX 10 Compatible
